title: ★★VEGAS ALLURE HIGH RISE ★★
posting_body: Absolutely beautiful unit, sitting in the right location.
As soon you step off the elevator within a few steps you are home.
Open the door and walk into a spacious dining area, kitchen with granite counters.
Breakfast bar flows into the living room.
Very nice den/office with a sliding door could also be utilized as a secondary bedroom.
Limitless possibilities!
Spacious master suite speaks for itself.
Washer/Dryer closet in just the right place.
Amenities galore!
Don’t leave without touring the AMENITIES!
All one could ever ask for.
State of the art exercise room, conference rooms, computer room, indoor kitchen, outdoor kitchen, table games.
Great view of the pool area, Strat, surroundings from the terrace of the unit.
This is a Must See!
You clearly will not be disappointed.
Location of Allure is very attractive as you have quick & easy access to freeway, Strip, etc.
